eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages

Class MessageResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.MessageResolver

  • public class MessageResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Resolver to create a valid NetworkMessage objects. After parsing it will try to return the suitable subclass.
    Author:
    sulfo

    • Method Detail

      • resolveNetworkMessage

        public NetworkMessage resolveNetworkMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Resolves the message that arrived from the network. A valid network message will contain a JSON that can be decoded as one of the NetworkMessage types.
        Parameters:
        String - Message body.
        Returns:
        Some extension of a NetworkMessage class, or null if the received message did not contain a valid or suitable JSON.

      • readJsonObject

        public javax.json.JsonObject readJsonObject(java.lang.String jsonString)
        Creates a JSON object from a string.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - A string that is to be decoded as a JSON.
        Returns:
        JsonObject if the decoding was successful, or null if something went wrong (string is not a valid JSON etc.).
